actions.text: Amendment SA 285 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 285 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration:  CR S4367-4368) To express the sense of the Senate that economic stimulus legislation enacted pursuant to the instructions contained in this concurrent resolution on the budget should include provisions to make higher education affordable.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 285 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 285 proposed by Senator Schumer.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate that economic stimulus legislation enacted pursuant to the instructions contained in this concurrent resolution on the budget should include provisions to make higher education affordable.
